name: asperabrowser
description: small Angular App and node.js server for Aspera file transfer
author: mhoff@de.ibm.com

scripts.build_all: npm run merge_npm; npm run merge_blue; npm run merge_docker; npm run build_docker; git push --all; git push --tags
scripts.build_docker: git checkout docker; ng build --prod --aot; cd node.js-server; docker build -t mhoff/asperabrowser . ; cd .. ; git checkout master
scripts.docker_push: v=v$(jq .version package.json | tr -d '"') ; echo $v ;  docker tag mhoff/asperabrowser mhoff/asperabrowser:$v ; docker push mhoff/asperabrowser:$v  ; docker push mhoff/asperabrowser
scripts.version: v=$(jq .version package.json) ; echo $v ; jq .version=$v node.js-server/package.json > p$$.json ; mv p$$.json node.js-server/package.json; git add node.js-server/package*
scripts.merge_npm: git checkout npm_package ; git merge -m 'merge master' master ; git checkout master
scripts.merge_blue: git checkout bluemix_deploy ; git merge -m 'merge master' master ; git checkout master
scripts.merge_docker: git checkout docker ; git merge -m 'merge master' master ; git checkout master
